theme.description: A clean, spacious, and authority-driven interface. White backgrounds, stark black text, and precise borders. Color is used only for function and focus.

headings.usage: Use for all page titles, section headers, and modal titles. Tight tracking (-0.02em).

body.usage: Use for all standard text, inputs, and table data. Normal tracking.

mono.usage: Use for code blocks, API keys, and ID strings.

rules: Never use pure black (#000000). Use Slate 900 (#0F172A).
Backgrounds should be white (#FFFFFF) or very light slate (#F8FAFC).
Borders should be subtle but visible (#E2E8F0).
Use the Accent color (#4F46E5) ONLY for primary actions (Save, Publish, Create).

structure.sidebar: Fixed width (w-64), collapsible, border-r border-border bg-surface/50 backdrop-blur-xl
structure.page_header: flex justify-between items-center mb-8 pb-4 border-b border-border/40

cards.style: bg-white border border-border rounded-lg shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-200

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the Sidebar layout as the primary wrapper for all protected routes.
Use the 'Bento' grid strategy for the Dashboard overview (mix of 1x1, 2x1, and 2x2 cards).
For the Page Builder, create a split-screen layout: Left side for block editing, Right side for live preview.
Ensure all forms use 'react-hook-form' with 'zod' validation.
Implement a 'Command Palette' (cmd+k) for quick navigation using a dialog component.
The Rich Text Editor should feel like Notion: minimal toolbar, slash commands support (if possible), and clean typography.
Media Library should support drag-and-drop uploads and grid/list view toggles.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not use generic centered layouts. Use asymmetric grids.
Create depth through layered design elements (z-index).
Use glass-morphism effects for sticky headers and overlays.
Add micro-interactions to all buttons and cards (hover lift, scale).
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs (p-8 instead of p-4).
Never use 'transition: all'. Animate specific properties.
Ensure all interactive elements have 'data-testid' attributes.
